title: Result of pushing off on ice

content.question: A brother and sister are standing next to each other at rest on a surface of frictionless ice. The brother’s mass is exactly twice that of his sister’s. The sister suddenly pushes her brother. As a result, the sister moves with kinetic energy <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow></math>. What is the resulting kinetic energy of the brother?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
